### Weather

- Precipitation (in): 0.45
- Wind Speed (mph): 15
- Conditions: Thunderstorms PM

### Field Notes
- Agricultural runoff visible in WQ-04/05 tributaries, seasonal fertilizer application
- Corn and soybean fields adjacent to corridor in active cultivation season
- Nutrient loading from agricultural drainage tiles suspected

### Compliance Flags
- No compliance flags recorded.

### Events
- Weekly grab samples collected all stations per SOP-12
- WQ-03 multiparameter sonde serviced
- Recreational use advisory board meeting scheduled

### Notes
- Day 14 monitoring. Agricultural runoff event affecting WQ-04/05 turbidity. Cr at WQ-03: 18 µg/L.
